about_the_game:
This is a 2D, top down, adventure game.  The gameplay consists of exploring and fighting monsters.   It also includes quests and item upgrades.   Upgrades can be purchased in a shop and meant to have fun mechanics as well as giving the player the ability to deal more damage.

It includes the following features and things to do:

  • Get lost exploring subterranean labyrinths while fighting off monsters.

  • Upgrade weapons and health to stay alive.

  • Save the world.

  • Find treasure.

  • Complete quests.

  • Talk to villagers and sometimes frogs.

  • Wide variety of overworld areas including foggy bogs, icy forests, mushroom forests, and burning wastelands.

  • 22 subterranean dungeons to get lost in.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu, Arch, SteamOS within last 2 years
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu, Arch, SteamOS within last 2 years
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: anything supported by Apple
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Most recent version
  • Processor: M3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Get lost exploring subterranean labyrinths while fighting off monsters. Upgrade weapons and health to stay alive. Save the world. Find treasure. Complete quests. Talk to villagers and sometimes frogs. Overworld including bogs, forests, mushroom forests. 22 subterranean dungeons to get lost in.
